page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: Nestles is not the only industrial centre in our area. We also have the Gortrush Industrial Estate which has twelve factories and is one of the main working centres in Northern Ireland. Once again it is just situated off the Derry Road enabling easy communication with the main ports. Shergrims kitchens are modern and fashionable. Cantrill and Cochrane, a mineral manufacturer, have a depot in the estate. They supply shops in the Omagh area with mineral. Securicor, a security company, are based here. Finlay's engineering works, which produce tractors and lorries, are also found on the estate. Rushe signs, a company which makes shop signs are based here.
